meanings.sent1: The bulbed flowers added a colorful touch to the garden.
meanings.sent2: The lamp had a bulbed base that glowed softly.
meanings.sent3: The bulbed vegetables rolled off the table comically.
meanings.sent4: Her cheeks bulbed with laughter as she told the joke.
meanings.sent5: The bulbed shape of the vase made it easy to grip.

meanings.sent1: The bulbed light fixture hung from the ceiling.
meanings.sent2: The tree had a bulbed trunk that widened near the ground.
meanings.sent3: The bulbed balloon floated gracefully in the sky.
meanings.sent4: His head bulbed out from under the hat.
meanings.sent5: The bulbed design of the ornament caught the light beautifully.

meanings.definition: Having a rounded or swollen shape.
meanings.sent1: The bulbed clouds filled the sky before the storm.
meanings.sent2: The bulbed belly of the bumblebee was full of nectar.
meanings.sent3: The bulbed cheeks of the baby made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: The hill bulbed gently in the distance.
meanings.sent5: The bulbed appearance of the fruit indicated its ripeness.
